body_html:
Reduced the package size by 2x to 582MB installed, and binary size to 287MB. Thanks to Natalia for the suggestions.

ls ~/miniconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib -alh
total 529M
drwxrwxr-x  3 fatbox fatbox 4.0K Jan 16 21:51 .
drwxrwxr-x 13 fatbox fatbox 4.0K Jan 16 21:51 ..
drwxrwxr-x  4 fatbox fatbox 4.0K Jan 16 21:51 include
lrwxrwxrwx  1 fatbox fatbox   19 Jan 16 21:51 libcublas.so -> libcublas.so.7.5.18

-rwxrwxr-x  1 fatbox fatbox 384K Jan 16 21:51 libcudart.so.7.5.18

-rwxrwxr-x  1 fatbox fatbox  58M Jan 16 21:51 libcudnn.so.5.1.3

lrwxrwxrwx  1 fatbox fatbox   19 Jan 16 21:51 libcurand.so.7.5 -> libcurand.so.7.5.18
-rwxrwxr-x  1 fatbox fatbox  50M Jan 16 21:51 libcurand.so.7.5.18
lrwxrwxrwx  1 fatbox fatbox   21 Jan 16 21:51 libcusparse.so -> libcusparse.so.7.5.18
lrwxrwxrwx  1 fatbox fatbox   21 Jan 16 21:51 libcusparse.so.7.5 -> libcusparse.so.7.5.18
-rwxrwxr-x  1 fatbox fatbox  36M Jan 16 21:51 libcusparse.so.7.5.18
-rwxrwxr-x  1 fatbox fatbox  30M Jan 16 21:51 libnccl.so

Reduced the package size by 2x to 582MB installed, and binary size to 287MB. Thanks to Natalia for the suggestions.
